GSD.description:
media: pvrusb2: fix memory leak in pvr_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit ba7dd8a9686a61a34b3a7b922ce721378d4740d0. For more details please see the references link.
